metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1547 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The NeXTDecode function in tif_next.c in LibTIFF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (uninitialized memory access) via a crafted TIFF image, as demonstrated by libtiff5.tif.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1547` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2').
